hero.title: Experience simplicity in every interaction
hero.subtitle: We build AI-driven tools, automation systems, and modern applications that simplify your workflow, reduce manual effort, and help your business move faster.

services.heading: What We Do
services.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solutions tailored to your business needs

service1.title: AI & Automation Systems
service1.description: Intelligent systems that automate repetitive tasks and provide insights from your data.

service2.title: Custom Web Applications
service2.description: Scalable web apps built with React, Django, FastAPI, and modern technologies.

service3.title: API Integrations
service3.description: Seamless connections between your tools and services for improved workflow.

service4.title: Payment Solutions

service5.title: Team Augmentation
service5.description: Expert developers to scale your team and accelerate project delivery.

service6.title: Training & Consulting
service6.description: Technical training and strategic consulting for AI, automation, and web development.

about.heading: Building Technology Solutions That Scale
about.paragraph1: Sannex specializes in AI-powered automation, custom web applications, and seamless integrations that help businesses operate more efficiently.
about.paragraph2: Based in Lagos, Nigeria, we work with churches, universities, startups, and enterprises across Africa and globally, delivering solutions that combine technical excellence with practical business value.
about.highlight2: Fullstack expertise with React, Django, FastAPI
about.highlight3: Experience with African and global clients

cta.heading: Have a project in mind?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how we can help you build AI-powered solutions, automate workflows, or develop custom applications that drive your business forward.

footer.description: We build AI-driven tools, automation systems, and modern applications that simplify your workflow, reduce manual effort, and help your business move faster.
